Description:
My investigation into a concern received by the Health and Safety Executive regarding staffing
arrangements on the Ninian Southern Platform has found that you do not have an appropriate process for developing and assessing the competence of new recruits to the operations department, either those who have transferred from other departments on the Ninian Southern Platform or those who have been recruited from other installations, in that you have failed to implement adequate arrangements which ensure that such production operators are provided with the necessary installation specific knowledge and experience, and you do not have in place a suitable and sufficient system for assuring competence of operators who you are relying upon to meet your minimum staffing levels, as defined in your procedure OPS-PRO-300 Baseline Manning Requirements for Production Operations
